S04n264:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatābhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ pañcabhiśca bodhisattvasahasraiḥ,

S04n264:10: mañjuśrīpramukhaiśca ṣaṣṭibhiranupamacittaiḥ bhadrapālapūrvaṃgamaiśca ṣoḍaśabhiḥsatpuruṣaiḥ bramhaṇā ca sahāṃpatinā śakreṇa ca devānāmindreṇa caturbhiśca lokapālaiḥ susīmena ca devaputreṇa susthitamatinā ca devaputreṇa sarvaiśca devendrairnāgendaiḥ kinnarendrairgandharvendrairyakṣendrairasurendrairgaruḍendraiḥ sarvairanekajātiśatasahasraparivāraistatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitaiḥ saṃniṣaṇṇaiḥ ||
S04n264:11: atha khalu bhagavān śrīgarbhasiṃhāsane saṃniṣaṇṇo merurivābhyudgataḥ sarvaparṣanmaṇḍalāt,
S04n264:20: sarvaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumābhayā sphuritvā bramhasvararutaravitena sarvasattvavijñāpanānugatena ghoṣeṇāśuviniścitārthaḥ sarvadharmaparamapāramiprāptaḥ parṣadgato dharmaṃ deśayati sma ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam,
S04n264:21: svarthaṃsuvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ bramhacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma ||
S04n264:22: atha khalu prāmodyarājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ |

S04n264:25: śrāvakabuddhasutān merutejā bhāsati hemagiriḥ sa yathaiva || 1 ||
S04n264:28: bramhavihāragataḥ sa ca bramha bramhapurastha ivābhirarāja |

S04n264:44: na ca te'sti samaḥ kvaci loke uttari nāpi ca vidyati sattvaḥ |
S04n264:45: puṇyatu jñānatu vīryaupāyaiḥ sarvaguṇaiśca samo na tavāsti || 11 ||

S04n264:56: anālayagaganagocarā hi buddhā bhagavanta iti saṃpaśyan,

S04n264:66: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇikṛtyaikānte'tiṣṭhat |

S04n264:98: netra utpalanibhaṃ manoramaṃ yena vīkṣyasi jagatkṛpāśayaḥ || 29 ||
S04n264:99: pūrṇacandra iva nirmale nabhe bhāsate tava mukhaṃ vināyaka |
S04n264:100: tṛpyate na hi nirīkṣako jano vandamo suvadanaṃ narottamam || 30 ||
S04n264:102: kampayan vrajasi medinītalaṃ vandamo daśabalaṃ dṛḍhavratam || 31 ||
S04n264:108: śāsamānu jaga dharmacaryayā dharmasvāmi praṇamāmi nāyakam || 34 ||
S04n264:109: maitra varma smṛti khaḍgamuttamaṃ śīla cāpamiṣu prajñupāyataḥ |

S04n264:119: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmāntaṃ rāṣṭrapālametadavocat-pṛccha tvaṃ rāṣṭrapāla yadyadevākāṅkṣasi |
S04n264:120: ahaṃ te tasyaiva praśnasya pṛṣṭasya vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣyāmi ||

S04n264:253: strī neha nāsti ca pumānna ca ātmanīyam || 64 ||

S04n264:320: na ca puna sa trasate yathaiva siṃhaḥ |

S04n264:351: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyā velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -

S04n264:391: catvāra ime rāṣṭrapāla pudgalā bodhisattvena na sevitavyāḥ |

S04n264:395: saddharmapratikṣepakaḥ pudgalo rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ |
S04n264:396: āmiṣalolupaḥ pudgalo rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ |

S04n264:448: kalpa acintiya pūrva carantaḥ sattvahitāya caran varabodhau |
S04n264:449: dānadame niyame'pi ca nityaṃ susthita āsi tyajitva ca jñātīn || 108 ||
S04n264:450: prāntavane sada nitya rato'haṃ śoṣita āśrayu bodhinidānam |
S04n264:451: na ca saṃsṛtu vīryaṃ kadācideṣata jñāna mahāpuruṣāṇām || 109 ||
S04n264:453: kṛtva kṛpāṃ vipulāmiha pūrve ārjita bodhi balājjagadarthe || 110 ||
S04n264:454: duhitṛsvasutāḥ priyabhāryāḥ tyakta purā dhanadhānya prabhūtāḥ |
S04n264:455: jīvita iṣṭa mahī susamṛddhā eṣata bodhivarāṃ bahukalpān || 111 ||
S04n264:456: phalapuṣpajalāḍhya suramya āsi vane muni kṣāntirato'ham |
S04n264:457: chinna karau caraṇau kalirājñā naiva mano'pi tadā mama duṣṭam || 112 ||
S04n264:458: vanakandari śyāmaku nāma āsi munirbharato gurujīrṇo |
S04n264:461: kāye na ca me na ca jīve bodhinimittamavekṣya babhūva || 114 ||
S04n264:465: śoṣitu ratnanidāna samudraḥ prāpya maṇiṃ sukhitāḥ kṛta sattvāḥ || 116 ||
S04n264:468: duḥkhita vīkṣya naraṃ ca daridraṃ tyakta mayā priyameva śarīram |
S04n264:469: prāpya dhanaṃ sa kṛtaśca mayāḍhyaḥ sarvadadena nṛpeṇa satā me || 118 ||
S04n264:470: śaraṇāgata vīkṣya kapotaṃ svaṃ piśitaṃ vinikṛtya śarīrāt |
S04n264:471: dattamapi svatanurna bhayārtastyakta ihāpi nṛpeṇa satā me || 119 ||
S04n264:473: jīvita tyajya parasya dadau taṃ kesarirāja babhūva yadāham || 120 ||
S04n264:474: caratā ca purā jagadarthe madri pativrata tyakta saputrā |
S04n264:477: uttaptavīryu yada āsīt arthadhanaśriyo'pi ca purā me || 122 ||
S04n264:479: pūjā kṛtā daśabalānām āsi nṛpātmaji vimalatejāḥ || 123 ||
S04n264:480: raudrākṣa eva ca ruṣitvā yācitavān sa cāpi mama śīrṣam |
S04n264:481: dattaṃ nikṛtya ca mayā tad rāja yadā ca candraprabha āsīt || 124 ||
S04n264:483: sattvārtha sthāpit mayā te puṇyasamo babhūva ca yadāham || 125 ||
S04n264:485: tyaktāṃ pūrvabhaveṣu caratā me āsi yadā śubho nṛpati pūrve || 126 ||
S04n264:487: tyaktaśca me makuṭa pūrva āsi nṛpo yadā ratanacūḍaḥ || 127 ||
S04n264:489: tyaktau karau sacaraṇau me pūrva nṛpeṇa dhṛtimatā ca || 128 ||
S04n264:491: kṛta mānuṣā badaradvīpe siṃhala sārthavāha yada āsīt || 129 ||
S04n264:492: kāmeṣu mṛrcchitamanā me bāli sa rākṣasī pramadasaṃjñā |
S04n264:493: pañcaśatāni vaṇijānāṃ mokṣita te yadā bhave sunetraḥ || 130 ||
S04n264:495: pravrajya nirgatu jinasya śāsane puṇyaraśmi yada āsīt || 131 ||
S04n264:496: mayi tyaktamaṅguli udārā sattvahitārthameva caratā me |
S04n264:497: jālārcitā vimalaśuddhā kāñcanavarṇa pārthiva yada āsīt || 132 ||
S04n264:499: tyaktā mayā ca jagadarthe utpalanetre pārthiva yadāsīt || 133 ||
S04n264:501: parimocitā karuṇayā me keśava vaidyarāja yada āsīt || 134 ||
S04n264:502: vyādhyāturaṃ ca naramīkṣya svaṃ rudhiraṃ pradattamapi me'bhūt |
S04n264:503: nirvyādhitaḥ sa ca kṛto me prāgbhava sarvadarśi yadabhūvam || 135 ||
S04n264:504: hivā svamasthi ca śarīrād vyādhikṛśasya majja mayā dattam |
S04n264:505: na ca sattva tyakta maya jātu āsi nṛpo yadā kusuma nāma || 136 ||
S04n264:506: sarvasvakośamapi tyaktva jīvita tyakta me priya manāpam |
S04n264:507: naru mokṣito vyasanaprāpta āsi nṛpo'rthasiddhi yada pūrvam || 137 ||
S04n264:509: nṛpa āśuketu yada āsīd bodhimabhīpsamāna jagadarthe || 138 ||
S04n264:510: nṛpa sarvadarśi yada āsīt kāruṇiko janārthahitakāmaḥ |
S04n264:511: tyaktā mayā caturo'pi ca dvīpāḥ sphītanarairvranarīśataiśca || 139 ||
S04n264:512: mṛdu komalaṃ vikalagauraṃ ūru tacchittva hṝṣṭamuditāyā |
S04n264:513: dattaṃ svamāṃsa rudhiraṃ me jñānavatī yadāsi nṛpaputrī || 140 ||
S04n264:515: strī prekṣya me kṣudhatṛṣārtaṃ sā rūpya (pa ?)
S04n264:519: rājñaḥ suto tu vikṛtajñaḥ tārita sāgarādyada kṛtajñaḥ |
S04n264:520: ratnārtha netra mama tena uddhṛta naiva me ruṣita cittam || 143 ||
S04n264:521: mā bhūtpipīlikavadho me tyakta varāśrayo'pi canapekṣya |
S04n264:522: na ca citta kampita tadā me tyakta pūrvabhaveṣu godha yada āsīt || 144 ||
S04n264:524: na ca mānavānapi ca stabdha āsi kapiṃjalo vicaramāṇaḥ || 145 ||
S04n264:525: śaraṇāgatasya ca mayārthe tyakta samucchrayaḥ kṛpa janitvā |
S04n264:526: na ca tyakta vānaragatena vyādhanaraḥ śarābhinihatena || 146 ||
S04n264:527: gajavaśagatena śoṣito me tanurapi vṛddhaguruṃ jagatsmaritvā |
S04n264:528: suruciramaśanaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ mokṣita ātma gajā yadā tadāsīt || 147 ||
S04n264:529: ṛkṣapatirabhūva śailadurge himahata sapta dināni rakṣito me |
S04n264:530: puruṣa vadhaku tena me prayukto na ca pratighāta kṛtaśca me tadāsmin || 148 ||
S04n264:532: sa viṣeṇa śareṇa ca viddho daṃṣṭravarāṃstyajamāna na dviṣṭaḥ || 149 ||
S04n264:535: gaṅgataraṅgajalairhiyamāṇaḥ tārita me yada āsi mṛgatve |
S04n264:536: vadhakā mama tenapanītā naiva mano mama tatra praduṣṭam || 151 ||
S04n264:538: taiśca hataḥ kṣudhitaiśca tadāhaṃ kacchapayonigato'pi ca maitraḥ || 152 ||
S04n264:539: bodhicariṃ caramāṇahu pūrvaṃ matsya babhūva yadā jalacarī |
S04n264:542: sattva kṛtāḥ sukhitā nirujāśca prāṇaku saumya tadā ca yadāsīt || 154 ||
S04n264:543: siṃha babhūva yadā mṛgarājā sthāmabalānvita kāruṇikaśca |
S04n264:544: viddha śareṇa na dūṣita cittaṃ maitri tadā vadhake'pi tadā me || 155 ||
S04n264:545: śaṅkhatuṣāranibho hayarājā āsi purā ca samudrataṭe'ham |
S04n264:546: rākṣasimadhyagatā vaṇijo me tārita kṛtva kṛpāṃ karuṇāṃ ca || 156 ||
S04n264:547: bodhicariṃ caramāṇa janārthe āsi kuṇāla ahaṃ yada pakṣī |
S04n264:548: varjita kāmaguṇā bahudoṣā no ca vaśaṃ pramadāna gato'ham || 157 ||
S04n264:549: āsi śaśo vanagulmanivāsī śāsatī taṃ sukṛte śaśavargam |
S04n264:551: āsi śuko drumapuṣpaphalāḍhyo śuṣkadrumo na ca me sa hi tyaktaḥ |
S04n264:552: dṛṣṭa kṛtajña tadā mama śakrastaṃ kṛtavāṃstaru patraphalāḍhyam || 159 ||
S04n264:554: rājabhayāttu vimokṣita te me vānararāja ahaṃ yada āsīt || 160 ||
S04n264:555: śuka bhūta purā guruhetoḥ śāli haraṃśca nareṇa gṛhītaḥ |
S04n264:556: kiṃ nu śukā harase mama śāli nāśayate'pi ca pakṣi maśasyam ( matsasyam) || 161 ||
S04n264:557: śuka so'bravīdbhadra śṛṇuṣva caurya harāmi na te ahu śālim |
S04n264:558: jīrṇagurudvayapoṣaṇahetoḥ śāli harāmi kṛpārtha tu teṣām || 162 ||
S04n264:559: bīja prakīrṇa yadā prathamaṃ te bhāga dadāmi sarvajanasya |
S04n264:560: tacca giraṃ vadato mama śrutvā tenāpi caurya bhavenna kadācit || 163 ||
S04n264:561: sādhu śukā hara śāli yatheṣṭaṃ durlabha mānuṣa yasyimu bhaktiḥ |
S04n264:562: mānuṣa tvaṃ maya tīryagatehā sādhu damaḥ śama saṃyama tubhyam || 164 ||
S04n264:563: ityevamāni caritāni pūrva caranta duṣkara kṛtāni |
S04n264:564: na ca me manasi tatra bhavi kheda eṣata uttamāṃ viraja bodhim || 165 ||
S04n264:565: ādhyātmikaṃ hyatha ca bāhyaṃ nāsti hi vastu yanmayā na dattam |
S04n264:566: śīle ca kṣānti tatha vīrya dhyāna upāya prajña carito'ham || 166 ||
S04n264:567: māṃsaṃ tvacaṃ tathapi ca majja śoṇitameva datta svaśarīrāt |
S04n264:568: prānte guhāsu ca yadā me śoṣita āśrayo'pi caratā me || 167 ||
S04n264:569: dhutayāna deśita jinebhiḥ yatra prayujyato jina bhavanti |
S04n264:570: tatra dhute satataṃ ca prayukto āsi caranta pure ahu nityam || 168 ||
S04n264:571: etādṛśā vrata udārā ye ca niṣevitā caratā me |
S04n264:572: śrutvā ca teṣamimāścaryamekapade na bhaviṣyati chandaḥ || 169 ||
S04n264:573: hāsyu bhaviṣyati ima śruṇitvā śāsanametadeva ca taḍānīm |
S04n264:576: śrutvā ca dharmamima śāntaṃ naiṣa jinokta ityabhivadanti || 171 ||
S04n264:577: ācāryo me śrutasamudro āsi bahuśrutaḥ kathikaśreṣṭhaḥ |
S04n264:578: tenāpi caiṣa pratiṣiddho buddhavaco hi naiṣa tu kathaṃcit || 172 ||
S04n264:579: parato'pyabhūdapi ca vṛddhaḥ tasya guruḥ sa śāmitaguṇaughaḥ |
S04n264:580: tenāpi naiṣa hi gṛhīto mātra prayujyatha vitathametat || 173 ||
S04n264:581: yatrātma nāsti na ca jīvo deśita pudgalo'pi na kathaṃcit |
S04n264:582: vyarthaḥ śramo'tra ghaṭate yaḥ śīlaprayoga saṃvarakriyā ca || 174 ||
S04n264:583: yadyasti caiva mahāyānaṃ nātra hi ātma sattva manujo vā |
S04n264:584: vyarthaḥ śramo'tra hi kṛto me yatra na cātmasattvaupalabdhiḥ || 175 ||
S04n264:586: bhāṣeta no jina kadācit vācamimāṃ hi bhikṣuparibhāṣām || 176 ||
S04n264:588: bhavitā hi bhikṣava mameha śāsani īrṣyamānamadadagdhāḥ || 177 ||
S04n264:591: buddhasya te dhvaja gṛhītvā sevakarā gṛhasthajanatāyām |
S04n264:592: lekhaṃ vahanti satataṃ te śāsanadaṃ vihāya guṇarāśim | 179 ||
S04n264:595: naiṣāmanāryamapi vācyaṃ naiva ca kiṃcidasti yadakāryam |
S04n264:596: staupika sāṃghikaṃ hyapi ca vittaṃ paugdalikaṃ ca yacca samameṣām || 181 ||
S04n264:597: bhikṣuṇa vīkṣya ca guṇāḍhyaṃ teṣvapi cāpyavarṇa kathayanti |
S04n264:598: duḥśīla vañcaka praviśya kuhāste strī ca vināśayanti hi sughorāḥ || 182 ||
S04n264:599: gṛddho gṛhīṇa tathā kāmairyādṛśe pravrajitva te gṛddhāḥ |
S04n264:600: bhāryāṃ sutā duhitaraśca teṣu bhaviṣya gṛhisamānam ||| 183 ||
S04n264:603: kāmā ime khalu na sevyāḥ pātana tiryakpretanirayeṣu |
S04n264:604: vakṣyanti te sada gṛhīṇāṃ te ca svayamadānta anupaśāntāḥ || 185 ||
S04n264:605: svayameva te yatha adāntāḥ śiṣyagaṇo'pi teṣa na sudāntaḥ |
S04n264:607: sevārthameva na guṇārthaṃ te khalu saṃgrahaṃ dadati teṣām |
S04n264:608: śiṣyagaṇaiḥ svakaiḥ parivṛto'haṃ pūja jane sadātra cala sidhya || 187 ||
S04n264:609: kathayanti te'pi ca janasya saṃgraha eṣa me karuṇayaiṣām |
S04n264:610: upasthāma prārthayāmi tebhya śiṣyagaṇebhya eva na kadācit || 188 ||
S04n264:612: pravrajiṣyanti narakeṣu āgatā āgatā sada anāryāḥ || 189 ||
S04n264:614: gṛhiṇo na te'pi vna ca bhikṣū varjita te yathā śmaśāna iva dāruḥ || 190 ||
S04n264:615: śikṣāsu cādara na teṣāṃ syānna ca prātimokṣavinaye vā |
S04n264:617: vanavāsināmapi hi teṣāṃ grāmagataṃ bhaviṣyati hi cittam |
S04n264:618: kleśāgninā prapatitānāṃ cittamavasthitaṃ hi na ca teṣām || 192 ||
S04n264:619: vismṛtya buddhaguṇa sarvān śikṣadhutāṃśca te'pi ca upāyāna |
S04n264:623: dhyānaṃ tathādhyayanaṃ tyaktvā nitya vihārakarmaṇi niyuktāḥ |
S04n264:625: na ca karmiko hyahaṃ vihāre ātmana hetureṣa hi kṛto me |
S04n264:628: damasaṃyame satatayuktāḥ saṃgraha teṣu te na kurute ca || 197 ||
S04n264:630: saṃmodikasya ca mamedaṃ gaccha na te'sti vāsa iha kaścit || 198 ||
S04n264:631: śayyāsanaṃ nikhila dattaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpitā iha prabhūtāḥ |
S04n264:632: na ca lābhasaṃbhava ihāsti kiṃ paribhokṣyase'tra vraja bhikṣo || 199 ||
S04n264:633: śayyāsanoddiśana teṣāṃ naiva bhaviṣyate'pi ca kadācit |
S04n264:635: nirbhartsitā pi ca samantātte hi mamaurasāścarimakāle |
S04n264:636: vacanaṃ na caite mam hi smṛtvā prāntavane tadābhinivasanti || 201 ||
S04n264:637: hā śāsanaṃ jinavarasya nāśamupekṣya hi nacireṇa |
S04n264:638: lābhābhibhūta guṇadviṣṭā bhikṣavaḥ prādurbhūta bahu yatra || 202 ||
S04n264:641: sada satkṛtā guṇavihīnā bhedaka sūcakāḥ kalahakāmāḥ |
S04n264:642: te śāstṛsaṃmata janasya te ca bhaviṣyanti mānamadadagdhāḥ || 204 ||
S04n264:645: ratnākaro yatha viluptaḥ sthāsyati padminīva pariśuṣkā |
S04n264:646: yūpa vararatnamayaṃ bhagnaṃ naśyati śāsanaṃ carimakāle || 206 ||
S04n264:648: te cāpi bhikṣava adāntā nāśayitāraḥ śāsanaṃ mamedam || 207 ||
S04n264:649: ma caryasevaniratānāṃ dūrata saṃgatiḥ kvacana teṣām |
S04n264:650: pretagatirnrake'pi ca vāsaḥ tiryagatiśca ito hi cyutānām || 208 ||
S04n264:652: labdhvā sa mānuṣabhavaṃ vā jāyati duḥkhitaḥ satata śocyaḥ || 209 ||
S04n264:653: andho'tha vā badhira kāṇo jāyati citragātra suvirūpā |
S04n264:655: viśrambhate'sya na ca kaścit śraddadhate'sya cāpi na ca vākyam |
S04n264:658: kṣuttṛṣṇa yena paritaptāste ca bhavanti sadā suparibhūtāḥ || 212 ||
S04n264:659: duḥkhā ananta iti jñātvā dūra pāpacaryaṃ vijahitvā |
S04n264:660: sevetha sādhucari nityaṃ mā bhavitānutāpa iha paścāt || 213 ||
S04n264:661: yasya priyo bhavati buddho āryagaṇaśca śikṣa dhutadharmāḥ |
S04n264:666: udyujyatāṃ ghaṭata nityaṃ pāramitāsu bhūmiṣu baleṣu |
S04n264:667: mā jātu saṃśayata vīryaṃ yāvanna budhyathā pravarabodhim ||216 ||
